Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 136th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2015, off Henry Lee (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2015, off Christopher Engstrom (NY)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,278,571 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 8/22/2016 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/4/2017 to a 5-year deal worth $2,000,500 per year...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
